title: Remove 'Non-Alcoholic Beverages' label from Tea and Coffee categories

requirements.summary: Remove the 'Non-Alcoholic Beverages' suffix from Tea and Coffee category display names throughout the frontend UI
acceptanceCriteria: The Tea category no longer shows 'Non-Alcoholic Beverages' anywhere in the UI.
The Coffee category no longer shows 'Non-Alcoholic Beverages' anywhere in the UI.
Both categories still appear and function correctly in the Order tab category grid.
Both categories still appear correctly in the Menu management page.
No other categories are affected by this change.

file_operations.description: Update the getCategoryDisplayName function to return 'Tea' instead of 'Tea (Non-Alcoholic Beverages)' and 'Coffee' instead of 'Coffee (Non-Alcoholic Beverages)'. Ensure the mapping logic correctly strips or omits the '(Non-Alcoholic Beverages)' suffix for these two categories while preserving display names for all other categories.
